text: Horacio Moráles (27 June 1943 – 26 February 2021) was an Argentine footballer. He played as a defender. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1964 Summer Olympics. Moráles died on 26 February 2021 in Larissa, Greece at the age of 60.Falleció Horacio Morales, jugador de Unión en los 60 ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Footballers from Buenos Aires Category:Olympians for Argentina
title: Horacio Moráles
